mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_DEVICE_SESS USING DUAL ON (DEVICE_SESS_ID = #{deviceSessId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET DEVICE_LOGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#{deviceLoginDt},'yyyymmddhh24miss'), DEVICE_SESS_EXP_DT = TO_DATE(#{deviceSessExpDt},'yyyymmddhh24miss'), DEVICE_CONN_IP = #{deviceConnIp} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( DEVICE_SESS_ID, CONN_DEVICE_ID, MEMB_ID, DEVICE_CTN, USIM_SN, DEVICE_CONN_IP, DEVICE_LOGIN_DT, DEVICE_SESS_EXP_DT, DEVICE_SERIAL, MEMB_NO ) VALUES ( #{deviceSessId}, #{connDeviceId}, #{membId}, #{deviceCtn}, #{usimSn}, #{deviceConnIp}, TO_DATE(#{deviceLoginDt},'yyyymmddhh24miss'), TO_DATE(#{deviceSessExpDt},'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{deviceSerial}, #{membNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT DEVICE_SESS_ID, DEVICE_CTN, USIM_SN, TO_CHAR(DEVICE_LOGIN_DT,'yyyymmddhh24miss') as DEVICE_LOGIN_DT, TO_CHAR(DEVICE_SESS_EXP_DT,'yyyymmddhh24miss') as DEVICE_SESS_EXP_DT, DEVICE_CONN_IP, CONN_DEVICE_ID, MEMB_ID, DEVICE_SERIAL, MEMB_NO FROM TB_DEVICE_SESS WHERE DEVICE_SESS_ID = #{deviceSessId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_DEVICE_SESS WHERE DEVICE_CTN = #{deviceCtn} AND DEVICE_SERIAL = #{deviceSerial}
